thread.title: Globo to Present at Verizon Healthcare Life Sciences Summit
thread.title_full: Globo to Present at Verizon Healthcare Life Sciences Summit

author: prbuzz.com
title: Globo to Present at Verizon Healthcare Life Sciences Summit
text:
One of the Largest and Most Strategic Conferences for Senior IT and Healthcare Professionals Covers “Innovating in Disruption”
What: Globo Plc (LSE-AIM: GBO, OTCQX: GOBPY), a global provider of complete solutions for the mobile enterprise, today announced its participation at the Verizon Healthcare Life Sciences Summit in Coronado, California. Verizon selected just seven companies to speak during its annual event.
Globo is helping the world’s leading brands create innovative mobile app experiences for their customers, employees and partners. The company’s unique engagement model combines mobile expertise, deep industry insight, a comprehensive set of app development and security products, and award-winning mobile app design and development services.
At the Verizon event, Globo will present its case study on CenClear . The non-profit leveraged Globo’s award-winning GO!Enterprise solutions to enhance mobility security for HIPAA compliance and increased operational efficiencies. CenClear’s results include:
 - Saved $105,000 from annual budge
 - Increased billable hours by 5 percent
 - Reduced paper consumption
 - Improved efficiency and connectivity
 - Minimized data entry errors
 - Enhanced overall reporting process
When: Verizon Healthcare Life Sciences Summit
 October 8-9, 2015
 Globo Presentation:
 October 9, 2015
 11:30 a.m. to 11:45 a.m. PST
Where: Hotel del Coronado
 Room: Main Ballroom
 1500 Orange Ave
 Coronado, CA 92118
About Globo: Globo (GBO.L) (GOBPY) empowers the mobile enterprise by enabling employees to work and collaborate from anywhere, anytime and by extending the enterprise’s engagement with customers and partners. Globo is unique in offering a complete enterprise mobility solution by merging Enterprise Mobility Management (EMM), Mobile Application Development Platform (MADP) and professional services. Globo solutions cover critical areas for a “Mobile First” enterprise, which are data security, app and device management as well as app design and development. The Group operates internationally in USA, Europe, Middle East and South East Asia, and has achieved worldwide recognition from leading analysts firms like Gartner, IDC and OVUM. For more information visit www.globoplc.com .
Contact: Lora Wilson/Gabriela Lechin
Global Results Communications
Office: +1 (949) 306 6476
Cell: +1 (949) 400 6532
